dev.nokee.platform.cpp

Interface HasCppSources

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CppApplication, CppApplicationExtension, CppLibrary, CppLibraryExtension

    public interface HasCppSources
    Represents a component that carries C++ sources.
    Since:
    0.5
    See Also:
    HasCppSourceSet

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void cppSources(Action<? super CppSourceSet> action)
      Configures the C++ sources of this component using the specified configuration action.
      default void cppSources(groovy.lang.Closure<Void> closure)
      Configures the C++ sources of this component using the specified configuration closure.
      default CppSourceSet getCppSources()
      Defines the C++ sources of this component.

    • Method Detail

      • getCppSources

        default CppSourceSet getCppSources()
        Defines the C++ sources of this component.

        By default, the source set contains all files in the directory src/componentName/cpp, where componentName represent this component's name, i.e. main or test.

        Returns:
        a source set containing the C++ sources of this component, never null
        See Also:
        CppSourceSet

      • cppSources

        default void cppSources(Action<? super CppSourceSet> action)
        Configures the C++ sources of this component using the specified configuration action.
        Parameters:
        action - the configuration action, must not be null
        See Also:
        getCppSources()

      • cppSources

        default void cppSources(@DelegatesTo(value=CppSourceSet.class,strategy=1)
                        groovy.lang.Closure<Void> closure)
        Configures the C++ sources of this component using the specified configuration closure.
        Parameters:
        closure - the configuration closure, must not be null
        See Also:
        getCppSources()
